title: Georgie to the rescue
creator_credit: Richard Slapczynski, Israel M. Berman and Viking Films Miniature Film Studios
brief_description: An animated film about Mr and Mrs Whittaker who live in the country with their pet cat and their friends Miss Oliver the owl and Georgie the gentle ghost. Based on the book by Robert Bright.
creator_credit_for_label: Richard Slapczynski, Israel M. Berman and Viking Films Miniature Film Studios
